sentences.translation: 不管发生什么，我们始终是一家人。

sentences.sentence: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
sentences.translation: 知生命之意者，可承生命之重。

sentences.sentence: Being too consumed in fear all the time will result in poor quality of life.
sentences.translation: 心中充斥太多的恐惧会让生活品质降低。

sentences.sentence: Everybody who walks a day on this planet is a survivor.
sentences.translation: 每个还能在这个星球上呼吸的人都是幸存者。
